excessive_forward_lean.explain: Torso angle is very horizontal at the start, increasing low back demand. Build tension and raise the chest.

too_upright.explain: Start position is very upright, often turning the pull into a squat. Set hips slightly higher and load the hamstrings.

knees_forward.explain: Knees travel too far forward, pushing the bar path away from midfoot.

hips_too_low.explain: Hips start too low, causing the bar to drift forward on the pull.

hips_too_high.explain: Hips start too high, shifting load away from the legs and into the back.
drills: Paused deadlift at 1 inch off floor 3x4

shoulders_forward.explain: Shoulders drift in front of the midfoot, pulling the bar away from the body.
drills: Lats-on cue: squeeze armpits before pull 3x5
Deadlift with PVC close to shins 3x6

rounded_back_risk.explain: Hip hinge angle suggests spinal flexion risk. Focus on neutral spine and bracing.
